hi,all

I get some ideas on add a page rank plugins on Heritrix.

Like the crawl.log files, record all the links to a plain file.

For every page, all the links extract from it should be recorded.

for example
----------------
from:http://www.agri.gov.cn/xxlb/t20040723_225007.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/gdxw/t20040722_224418.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/gndt/t20040715_221819.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/gndt/t20040716_222180.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/gndt/t20040719_222571.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/gndt/t20040723_225057.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/index.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/jjps/t20040715_221670.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/kjtg/t20040716_222240.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/xxlb/index.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/xxlb/t20040721_224131.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/xztz/t20040721_223862.htm
to:http://www.agri.gov.cn/ztzl/qfbjhflssc/gddt/t20040716_222291.htm

from:http://www.stee.agri.gov.cn/xwzx/t20040813_232208.htm
to:http://www.stee.agri.gov.cn/default.htm
to:http://www.stee.agri.gov.cn/xwzx/default.htm
--------------

Then count the appear time of a page appear in "to:" lines.
The more times page have a high page rank.

and can anyone give some suggection about where can this plugins 
should be added into the process chains?

ansi
